slide.title: Getting Started
slide.blurb: PEAR and PECL packages are installed using the %pear% command line tool that automates the process by communicating with the repository via remote procedures.

list.bullet: Mass upgrades of all installed packages
Creation, signing, and release of new PEAR/PECL packages
